means: 执行遗产管理人的职责

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"管理，支配"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: control, direct, govern, manage, rule, supervise, administer
means: control ： 含义广泛的常用词，指对人或物施以约束或控制的力量。
direct ： 侧重行使领导或指导权。
govern ： 侧重指运用任何控制的权力来统治或管理一个国家、一个社会或一个部门，暗含能力和知识的运用。
manage ： 强调对具体事务机构进行管理，有时含受权管理或处理之意。
rule ： 强调用绝对或独裁的权力来管理或统治。
supervise ： 侧重指运用本身的或被授予的权力来管理、检查工作，含监督意味。
administer ： 指官方的或正式的对事务的管理。

sentence.Network_en: Next summer's exams would be straightforward to administer and mark.
sentence.Network_cn: 明年夏天的考试在执行和评分上都将很简单。

sentence.Network_en: Paramedics are trained to administer certain drugs.
sentence.Network_cn: 护理人员们接受了配发某些药物的培训。

sentence.Network_en: He thinks the tax is impossible to administer.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... minister n 仆人；部长 administer v 管理，治理 administration n 行政，管理.
字典中靖字的解释 ... (5) 平定[ pacify] (7) 治理[ administer] (9) 思念[ think].
英语六级听力高频词汇_百度文库 ... adhere vi. 粘附；遵守，坚持 administer vt. 掌管，执行 advocate vt. 倡导，拥护 n.倡导者.
BEC中级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... adjust vt. 调整，校准 administer vt. 管理；实施；给予 administration n. 经营管理；行政.

list.abs: ... To let go for a price;sell. 按价格卖掉；出售 To administer: 服药（to administer）： give him some cough medicine. 给他一些治咳嗽的药.
生活中常用... ... 主办城市 the host city 综合治理 comprehensively administer 濒临停产边缘 be close to production collapse.
最新实用英汉国际金融词典 - MBA智库文档 ... administer 管理人 administered price 限价 advanced capital 预付资本.
商务英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... adman 广告掮客 administered price 管制价格 administration charges 行政管理费.
BEC初级口语词汇详解 -... ... administer justice 执行审判 administer arbitration 管理仲裁 administer relief 进行救济.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via Old French from Latin administrare, from ad- 'to' + ministrare (see minister)

entry.tran: 治理，管理（国家等）；施行，实施（法律、考核等）
entry.def: If someone administers something such as a country, the law, or a test, they take responsibility for organizing and supervising it.

example.ex: The plan calls for the UN to administer the country until elections can be held...
example.tran: 该方案呼吁联合国来管理该国，直到能进行选举为止。

example.ex: We hope that they're going to administer justice impartially...
example.tran: 我们希望他们能主持正义，不偏不倚。

entry.def: If a doctor or a nurse administers a drug, they give it to a patient.

example.ex: Paramedics are trained to administer certain drugs.
example.tran: 护理人员们接受了配发某些药物的培训。

entry.def: If someone administers a punch or a kick, they punch or kick someone.

example.ex: He is shown in the tape of the beating as administering most of the blows.
example.tran: 录像显示在斗殴中他打得最凶。

means.word_mean: 1. work in an administrative capacity; supervise;
3. administer or bestow, as in small portions;

sentences.sentence: "shell out pocket money for the children"

auth_sentence.res_content: Qualified to administer both worldly and ghostly comfort.

stems_affixes.word_buile: administer[[v.施行,实施;掌管,料理……的事务;给予]]男→adj.管理的,行政的
minister部长+y表名词,加在形容词或r结尾的单词后→ministry部门

stems_affixes.value_cn: 管理, 经营, 行政部门
stems_affixes.word_buile: administer[[v.施行,实施;掌管,料理……的事务;给予]]→n.管理, 经营, 行政部门
mini小+ature表名词→小物品→小画象
mini小+ster人→小人→古代大臣称呼自己"小人"→部长,大臣

stems_affixes.value_cn: 施行,实施;掌管,料理……的事务;给予
使减少到最少,使降到最低
stems_affixes.word_buile: minim[n.极小之物;半音符]+ize表动词→减少到最少
di分开+mini小+ish表动词→变小,减少

Sentence.sentence: Hospital workers in at least one case deserted their workplace in panic, thus halting the administering of potentially unclean disease spreading injections, but Ebola has not disappeared.

means.word_mean: 管理, 支配  管理（公司、组织、机构）；治理（国家）

sentences.en: They had the right to administer their own internal affairs.
sentences.cn: 他们有权料理自己的事务。

sentences.en: The doctor administered some medicines to his patient.
sentences.cn: 医生给了他的病人一些药。

sentences.en: An oath was administered to the newly elected President.
sentences.cn: 新当选的总统执行了宣誓手续。

jushi.english: She administered badly before the new manager came here.
jushi.chinese: 新经理来之前她管理得很糟糕。

jushi.english: He administered very well before he left.
jushi.chinese: 在走之前他一直管理得不错。
